content:
image.png
This is a challenge - I could not figure it out at a first glance how to do this in FHIR:
posology (DosageInstruction) = "1 tablet before dinner time soap opera"

i assume there is probably a SNOMED CT code for that. You just need to decide whether to use the one for taking the tablet before dinner time soap opera with your left hand or the one for your right hand.
I think we'd need to standardize the soap operas - to eliminate ambiguity

James Agnew said/near/200583600):

decide whether to use the one for taking the tablet before dinner time soap opera with your left hand or the one for your right hand.

soooo true..
You might need to post coordinate with the SCTID of the preferred Telenovela
